version_description:
- Background audio issues fixed
- Difficulty level adjusted for Draw-1 and Draw-3 modes
- New languages supported: German, French, Korean and Japanese (more to come)
- Minor bugs fixed and UI improvements
- Share ceremonies and your scores with your friends!

- Background audio issues fixed
- Difficulty level adjusted for Draw-1 and Draw-3 modes
- New languages supported: German, French, Korean and Japanese (more to come)
- Minor bugs fixed and UI improvements
- Share ceremonies and your scores with your friends!

Happy Holidays with Solitaire: Decked Out!

- Discover three new decks!
- Find friends and exchange your codes to unlock extra items!
- New languages supported: Thai, Russian, Portuguese
- Minor bugs fixed

Happy Holidays with Solitaire: Decked Out!

- Discover three new decks!
- Find friends and exchange your codes to unlock extra items!
- New languages supported: Thai, Russian, Portuguese
- Minor bugs fixed

Thank you so much for playing Solitaire: Decked Out!

- Introducing Puzzle Gallery: Unlock Puzzle Gallery by completing a Deck Collection! Find Puzzle Pieces to reveal hidden stories and complete your collection.
- Background audio issues fixed
- New language supported: Chinese (Traditional)
- Minor UI improvements and bug fixes

Thank you so much for playing Solitaire: Decked Out!

- Introducing Puzzle Gallery: Unlock Puzzle Gallery by completing a Deck Collection! Find Puzzle Pieces to reveal hidden stories and complete your collection.
- Background audio issues fixed
- New language supported: Chinese (Traditional)
- Minor UI improvements and bug fixes

For the past 3 years, Solitaire: Decked Out has been loved by so many of you. We feel the love and are committed to giving you the best Solitaire game possible!
To continue the support, we are introducing ads and the ability to unlock free coins by watching rewarded videos.

We've added the ability for you to remove ads by purchasing a subscription.
We've added a brand new deck for you to play with, made by Sing Ji.
